member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbClientDP
member.summary: Represents a USB Device module that allows the mainboard to be programmed over USB. Red USB Device modules also apply USB power (5V) to the mainboard and peripherals.

remarks.para: The class has no programmable functionality other than internally reserving the pins used by the USB Device module, which allows programming of the mainboard. Red USB Device modules also provide power to the mainboard and peripherals from the USB power source. Important: only plug in one Red module at a time.
You may also be interested in other USB module types listed below.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.UsbClientDP.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.
